trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 裝載 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that display images.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>類別是特殊的類型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>類別，用來以邏輯方式主機的儲存格顯示的影像。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>都具有相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>中每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>，與交集。

trans-unit.source: Each cell is capable of containing an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> or an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料格是否包含<xref:System.Drawing.Image>或<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>上的值，取決於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Displaying icons is useful to accommodate images with transparency.
trans-unit.target: 顯示圖示適合容納影像的透明度。

trans-unit.source: By default, empty cells display a default error graphic.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，空白資料格會顯示預設的錯誤圖形。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this graphic from appearing for cell values equal to `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the cell style object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property to `null` before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個圖形顯示的資料格的值等於`null`或<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的儲存格樣式物件的屬性所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性`null`之前加入至控制項的資料列。

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: 不過這不影響新的記錄的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免錯誤圖形資料列中出現新的記錄時控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>屬性值是`true`，您也必須其中一個明確地設定儲存格的值為`null`中控制項的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>事件或集合資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>的執行個體的內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-衍生的類型與覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>屬性，傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.NotSortable>.
trans-unit.target: 此資料行類型的預設排序模式是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.NotSortable>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use images to create a TicTacToe game.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用影像來建立井字遊戲。

trans-unit.source: When you derive from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Clone" /> method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.
trans-unit.target: 當您衍生自<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" />並將新屬性加入衍生的類別，請務必覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Clone" />方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。

trans-unit.source: You should also call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Clone" /> method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.
trans-unit.target: 您也應該呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Clone" />方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> class, configuring it for use with cell values of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體，將它設定為要與型別 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的儲存格值一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>與`valuesAreIcons`參數值的`false`。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> property of cells in this column will be set to values of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that they will be set to values of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示此資料行中的儲存格之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> 屬性將會設定為型別 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 的值；<see langword="false" /> 表示此屬性將會設定為型別 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> class, optionally configuring it for use with <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> cell values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> 類別的新執行個體，選擇性地將它設定為要與 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 儲存格值一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會初始化資料行，藉由設定下列屬性。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property initialized to the `valuesAreIcons` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>具有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性初始化為`valuesAreIcons`參數值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `valuesAreIcons` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `valuesAreIcons` 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>所傳回物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>所傳回物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if `valuesAreIcons` is `true` and type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> if `valuesAreIcons` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>如果`valuesAreIcons`是`true`和型別<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>如果`valuesAreIcons`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> cell values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保的 alpha 色板<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>正確繪製儲存格的值，請使用這個建構函式與`valuesAreIcons`參數值的`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來建立新儲存格的樣板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />，做為資料欄中所有其他儲存格的模型。

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>類別初始化這個屬性，以新建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>。

trans-unit.source: Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: 變更儲存格範本的內容不會立即影響資料行的現有儲存格的使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method).
trans-unit.target: 重新產生資料行後，才明顯這些變更 (例如，則資料行排序或透過呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which is similar to this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，這是類似於這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 處理 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The set type is not compatible with type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 此集合型別與型別 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell" /> 不相容。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: 建立與這個資料行完全相同的複本。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the cloned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示複製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: 若要複製的資料格的資料行使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料行的預設儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: 要套用為預設樣式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values:
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>傳回由此屬性有下列的初始屬性值：

trans-unit.source: `DataGridViewCellStyle` property
trans-unit.target: `DataGridViewCellStyle` 屬性

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: 預設值

trans-unit.source: A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, a standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>如果初始<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性值是`true`; 否則類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>。

trans-unit.source: These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些值會覆寫中指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>的控制項，但是可能會覆寫其他儲存格樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the standard error graphic from appearing for `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType> cell values, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for this cell style object to `null` or your own error graphic before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止標準錯誤圖形中出現的`null`或<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>儲存格的值，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>這個儲存格樣式物件的屬性`null`或錯誤圖形，然後再將資料列加入至控制項。

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: 不過這不影響新的記錄的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` or your own error graphic in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null` or your own error graphic.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免錯誤圖形資料列中出現新的記錄時控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>屬性值是`true`，您也必須是明確地設定儲存格的值為`null`或錯誤圖形控制項處理常式中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>事件或資料行集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>的執行個體的內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-衍生的類型與覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>屬性，傳回`null`或您自己的錯誤圖形。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性有值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>、 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性值設定為`true`會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>至類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>、 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性值設定為`false`會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that describes the column's image.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可描述資料行的影像之字串。

trans-unit.source: The textual description of the column image.
trans-unit.target: 資料行影像的文字描述。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Description%2A> property to describe the image provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Description%2A>屬性以描述所提供的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This description provides an accessible alternative to the image.
trans-unit.target: 此描述會提供可存取的替代至映像。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 此外，儲存格的值會複製到剪貼簿時，會使用描述文字。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>資料行中每個資料格的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Description%2A> property to reflect the image layout.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Description%2A>屬性以反映影像配置。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> 屬性的值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> property is not set and the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 當未設定儲存格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> 屬性且儲存格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" /> 時，取得或設定此資料行的儲存格內所顯示的圖示。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property specifies an icons that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>屬性會指定會顯示在當資料行不是資料繫結沒有值的資料格和儲存格的圖示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結資料行的資料格沒有相關聯的映像，會顯示標準錯誤圖形。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property rather than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property ensures that an alpha channel in an icon is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>屬性而非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>屬性可確保會正確繪製圖示中的有 alpha 色板。

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要顯示<xref:System.Drawing.Image>而不是<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>屬性改為設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性表示是否儲存格會顯示個別儲存格的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> property is not set and the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 當未設定儲存格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> 屬性且儲存格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="false" /> 時，取得或設定此資料行的儲存格內所顯示的影像。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property specifies an image that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>屬性指定的映像，會顯示在當資料行不是資料繫結沒有值的資料格和儲存格的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結資料行的資料格沒有相關聯的映像，會顯示標準錯誤圖形。

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要顯示<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>而不是<xref:System.Drawing.Image>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>屬性改為設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the alpha channel of the <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: 如此可確保的 alpha 色板<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>正確繪製。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property value when there is no cell value.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性表示是否儲存格會顯示個別儲存格的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>沒有資料格的值時的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the default image.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定預設的影像。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image layout in the cells for this column.
trans-unit.target: 為此資料行取得或設定儲存格中的影像配置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout" /> that specifies the cell layout.
trans-unit.target: 指定儲存格配置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to stretch and zoom images to fit cells.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何調整及縮放以符合資料格影像。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> 屬性的值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述資料行的字串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，描述資料行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in this column display <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出此資料行中的儲存格是否會顯示 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if cells display values of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />; <see langword="false" /> if cells display values of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果儲存格顯示型別 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> 的值，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果儲存格顯示型別 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 的值，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保的 alpha 色板<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>正確繪製的值，這個屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性有值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>、 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性值設定為`true`會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>至類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>、 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性值設定為`false`會自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> 屬性的值是 <see langword="null" />。
